alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Charles Mix (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:55PM MDT until July 05 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHARLES MIX...BON HOMME...SOUTHEASTERN DOUGLAS... YANKTON AND SOUTHWESTERN HUTCHINSON COUNTIES... At 254 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Scotland to near Dante to near Gross, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 250 PM CDT, a 60 mph wind gust was reported 6 miles northeast of Tyndall. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Scotland around 300 PM CDT. Tyndall, Springfield and Utica around 310 PM CDT. Mayfield around 315 PM CDT. Tabor and Mission Hill around 320 PM CDT. Irene and Volin around 325 PM CDT. Yankton and Lewis And Clark State Recreation Area around 330 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Gayville, Lesterville and Yankton Sioux Tribal Nation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
